question: Which of the following treatises resonates with Nirguna-bhakti?
explanation: Sandilya Bhakti Sutra which was written by Sandilya resonates with Nirguna-bhakti, and Narada Bhakti Sutra which was written by Narada leans towards Saguna-bhakti. These are two 12th-century influential treatises on bhakti.
